Class FeatureMining

  • java.lang.Object
    • FeatureMining

  • public class FeatureMining
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the main class to perform feature mining. The simplest way to summarize a review is shown in the main() method. To summarize several reviews in a row, one should set the dataPath and call mineFeature(reviewPath) only with the review path. Otherwise, the feature extraction will take place every time.
    Author:
    Antoine Sachet

      • mineFeatures

        public FeatureRating.Summary mineFeatures(java.lang.String reviewPath,
                                 java.lang.String dataPath,
                                 java.lang.Boolean verbose)
                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Summarize a review given a database of similar reviews.
        Parameters:
        reviewPath: - the path to a single review to summarize
        dataPath: - the path to a directory containing reviews of the same category
        verbose: - boolean indicating whether to print intermediate messages
        Returns:
        A summary of the review (see FeatureRating.Summary)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
